What is Kiro?

Kiro is an intelligent GitHub App that provides automated code review assistance, helping your team maintain high code quality standards through AI-powered analysis and suggestions.

Installation Steps

Step 1: Install the App

Click the install button below to add Kiro to your GitHub organization or personal account.


Install Kiro GitHub App

Step 2: Configure Repositories

Select which repositories you want Kiro to monitor. You can start with a test repository and expand later.

Step 3: Set Preferences

Customize Kiro's behavior through the configuration interface to match your team's coding standards.

Required Permissions

Kiro requires the following permissions to function properly:

  • Read repository contents and metadata
  • Read and write pull request comments
  • Read issues and project boards
  • Receive webhook notifications for events
  • Access commit statuses for CI integration

Security & Privacy

Kiro takes security seriously:

  • All data is encrypted in transit and at rest
  • No code is stored permanently - only analyzed in memory
  • Compliant with GDPR and SOC 2 standards
  • Optional on-premises deployment available
